description: This Dart source file defines a service class for handling referral-related operations in a mobile application. It includes a method to submit referral codes via HTTP POST requests using the Dio package, processes responses, and handles errors.

classes.name: ReferralsService
classes.description: Provides methods to interact with referral API endpoints, including submitting referral codes.
